transcript:
Customer: dekhna Aastha ne kya update kiya hai site kya.
Customer: Ussima se kar lo.
Customer: Number nayi no call ki nayi sheet update hui hai Muskan? Muskan?
Customer: Hello. No call ki nayi sheet kuch hai? Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan. Good afternoon sir. Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Senior manager. Kaise hain aap sir?
Customer: Ah, mam dusra number hai us pe call kijiye na. Mai IndiaMART handle nahi karta hu.
Executive: Aap handle nahi karte? Dusra number? Haan number bol dijiye sir.
Customer: 9 9727
Executive: 9727
Customer: 66
Executive: 66
Customer: 587
Executive: Theek hai sir. Mai is pe call kar leti hu. Thank you.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not handle IndiaMART.

- Wants the executive to call on another number.



Resolution:

- Executive noted the alternate number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on the provided number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- alternate number, indiaMART, call transfer
